about_the_game:
WordLeap is an arcade action vocabulary game. In WordLeap your goal is to make rare and interesting words to score points. There are several game modes, each with its own style of play.

Play story mode to unlock new levels and try to reach enlightenment. Casual mode offers a quick game that you can play any time. Puzzle mode is for those looking for a more intellectual challenge.

Extensive leaderboards allow you to compete with players from around the world for the highest scores and best words.

This demo allows you to play a portion of the game's main story mode and two additional game modes on the 4 included levels (unlocked as you progress through the story levels).

name: WordLeap Demo
short_description: This action-based word game will test your knowledge by giving you higher rewards for less common words. Jump from tile to tile, picking up letters as you go to spell out words that can be exchanged for points.
